description: Complete system overview covering the nanopore sequencing workflow architecture, core components, and integration points between AI processing and sample tracking
Detailed documentation of the 8-step nanopore sequencing workflow model, including state transitions, validation rules, and processing requirements for each stage
Technical documentation of the AI-powered data extraction pipeline, including LLM processing, RAG enhancement, confidence scoring algorithms, and field validation rules
Comprehensive documentation of data flow between components, covering sample submission, real-time status updates, PDF processing pipeline, and export transformations
Detailed documentation of the sample tracking data model, status progression logic, priority system, and relationship with the processing workflow
